title: Ein Tag mit Paula
translation: Paula gets up early and quickly gets dressed. She is very hungry and eats an apple. After that, she goes to the station to register for the trip. Paula asks at the counter about the departure and the connection. The announcement says the train to the north leaves at eight o’clock. Another traveler offers Paula a map. Paula ticks the directions and is ready to leave. She departs and writes a postcard with the sender’s name on it. After a long journey, she arrives in the east. The arrival is mentioned in the announcement. Paula sits alone on a bench and thinks about the trip.
